name: Disco Ball
description:
Disco Ball

- A bright arcade game in the Disco style. Control a glowing ball and perform dexterous maneuvers on moving platforms. The graphics are filled with disco elements-bright flashes, constantly changing environments, dynamic gameplay and groovy disco music! Collect coins to score as many points as possible. Use the special bonus "Rush" to overcome long distances and not fall. Bonus "Wings" allows you to make several mistakes and raise the ball from the abyss.

Key Features:
- Endless gameplay;
- Great soundtrack;
- Fascinating gameplay.
